prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles a small fish with a sleek body and vibrant colors.
Imagine a playful aquatic creature with a long, slender body and unique blue markings.
Show me a tiny Pokemon that thrives in wetlands, with a smooth appearance and a cheerful demeanor.
Generate a Pokemon design featuring a fish-like creature that has distinct whiskers and a wavy tail.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of rivers, with a streamlined shape and bright aqua tones.
Design a cute, small water Pokemon with a whimsical look that loves to swim around in marshy areas.
Give me an adorable Pokemon with a simple body shape and a friendly personality, suited for watery habitats.
